mdRecord.dcterms:title: Aspirating set
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Set contained in dark plastic case; includes: Xacto Shok Pruf Tempered Glass 1118 [GRADED 0-10 cc] Syringe; Straight 6.5 cm Aspirating Syringe Tube Attachment; Y-shaped 3.5 cm AspiratingSyringe Tube Attachment; 2 Y-shaped 5 cm Aspirating Syringe Tube Attachments; L-Shaped 6 cm Aspirating Syringe Tube Attachment; Straight 4.5 cm Aspirating Syringe Tube; Straight 7 cm Aspirating Syringe Tube with bubble; 3 Syringe Needle Cases; 2 V.2A Xacto Syringe Needles; Tube Attachment.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus--Syringes
